name: Fractured Disney Movies Quiz | Movie Fractures | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Beauty and the Beast.

	'Be our guest, be our guest! Put our service to the test!' I love Lumiere, Cogsworth, and Gaston.

Sleeping Beauty & The Sleeping Beauty.

	I like the scene in which the three fairies try to make a cake and gown for the princess.

Mulan.

	The boot camp scene is great. So is the tea ceremony scene.

questions.text: Juan hungered tan won dial mesh Huns
questions.correct: 101 Dalmatians & one hundred and one dalmatians
questions.explanation:
101 Dalmatians & one hundred and one dalmatians.

	As kids we used to spend hours pretending to be the puppies running away from Cruella de Vil--who may be the best Disney villain ever. EDITOR'S NOTE--Please, before sending corrections, note that the spelling here is *correct*! It is DalmatiAns, since these dogs originally came from Dalmatia.

Lady and the Tramp.

	'We are Siamese if you please. We are Siamese if you don't please!'

Hercules.

	Again, a great comic villain--voiced by James Woods.

Cinderella.

	"Cinderelly, Cinderelly, all we hear is Cinderelly!" (sing the mice).

questions.correct: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs & Snow White and the Seven Dwarves
questions.explanation:
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs & Snow White and the Seven Dwarves.

	'Heigh ho, heigh ho, it's off to work we go!'

The Sword in the Stone.

	My little sister had a record of this movie's soundtrack that she played over and over and OVER, so I have blocked all of the songs from my memory.

The Lion King.

	Wow, that opening scene! Great music, great characters. I've heard the stage show is wonderful, too.
